tool_description: A collection of information about the latest anime season
title: anime-collection

api_list.name: Get information from list of airing anime
api_list.description: Get information from list of airing anime
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-collection.p.rapidapi.com/season"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-collection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
